REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1159 reute d f BC-PIEDMONT-AIR-<PIE>-FE 03-20 0048

TEXT.TITLE: PIEDMONT AIR <PIE> FEBRUARY FREIGHT TRAFFIC UP
TEXT.BODY: Piedmont Aviation Inc said February cargo ton miles tose 33.9 pct to 4,419,923 from 3,299,686 a year earlier. It said year-to-date cargo ton miles rose 26.5 pct to 8,504,918 from 6,720,440 a year before. Reuter
